items.sentence: When did you find out that Tom didn\'t know how to speak French?
I\'m pretty sure Tom didn\'t know Mary wasn\'t going to do that.
I didn\'t tell my parents that I only got a C on my French test.
I didn\'t want the baby to catch a cold, so I closed the window.
I didn\'t want to live in Boston anymore, so I moved to Chicago.
I didn\'t want to work late, but the boss told me that I had to.
Tom and Mary didn\'t know each other until John introduced them.
Tom and Mary didn\'t tell anybody they were planning to do that.
Tom asked Mary what the word meant, but she didn\'t know either.
At 10 o\'clock yesterday, there were hundreds of people outside.
